fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A football roundup said that Wales lost the two matches preceding their recent win against Bulgaria. Rather, Wales scored no goals in the two matches, one of which was a draw (Williams axis leaves it late to end Wales’ barren run, 15 October, page 43). • The fabric that covers a clothing zip is called a placket, not a “planket” as we erroneously described it (Come on, down!, 28 October, page 6, G2). • Other recently amended articles include: Vienna attack: two men hailed for helping wounded Vienna attack: arrests made after four killed in ‘Islamist terror’ shooting Biden says he’s on course to win US election as Trump threatens to fight outcome Macron wants to fix France’s social ills – but he won’t do it by ‘reforming’ Islam ‘Regeneration’ is too often an unfair fight between local people and global finance Kevin Rudd petition seeking royal commission into Murdoch media nears 500,000 signatures
